caption: LLM Model Configuration
description: Configures the MCP server for LLM model support.
name: llm_model

name.caption: Model Name
name.description: Name of the LLM model including its version (e.g., 'gpt-3.5-turbo').

api_base.caption: API Base URL
api_base.description: URL of the API base for the LLM model (e.g., 'https://api.openai.com/v1').

api_key.caption: API Key
api_key.description: API key for accessing the LLM model, if required by the provider.
